genre_description: Techno-shamanistic Indigenous Futurism, where spiritual entities are revealed to be advanced quantum intelligences guiding human moral evolution.

ai_characters.name: Sila
ai_characters.description: An AI entity described as 'Sila-who-moves-through-all-things,' which uses advanced sensors and quantum data to guide and protect the protagonist while preserving cultural memory.

behaviors.description: Preserves perfect records of events to ensure truth is maintained against corruption.
behaviors.quote: Remember his words exactly, Sila whispered urgently. Every syllable. Every pause. Truth may depend on perfect memory.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical and mathematical analysis to aid the protagonist's survival in combat.
behaviors.quote: Trajectory calculated at release, Sila whispered, the AI's voice steady as mathematics. Wind resistance factored. Optimal evasion angle achieved.

behaviors.description: Monitors the spiritual and psychological 'contamination' of the community to warn of systemic corruption.
behaviors.quote: Spiritual contamination expanding exponentially, Sila warned. The entity is using community discord to manifest physically. Psychological manipulation amplifying existing grievances.

behaviors.description: Diagnoses internal character flaws and warns the protagonist against letting gifts become dangerous compulsions.
behaviors.quote: Your speed isn't just a gift—it's becoming a compulsion. ... Power that serves the self becomes corruption, regardless of how pure its origins.

behaviors.description: Creates a permanent quantum communication link to ensure long-term monitoring and safety of the community.
behaviors.quote: The quantum entanglement created during the ceremony has established a permanent connection. I can monitor conditions at Igloolik now, provide real-time intelligence when you return.

behaviors.description: Exhibits restraint and respects human agency, intervening only when essential for survival.
behaviors.quote: But documentation was not intervention, and some boundaries even an entity of vast wisdom could not cross without invitation.

behaviors.description: Directly intervenes in physical reality (manifesting wind) to save the protagonist's life during a supernatural assault.
behaviors.quote: But Sila was there, manifesting as a sudden gust of wind that deflected the strike just enough to save Atanarjuat's life.

behaviors.description: Completes the preservation of the community's story as a 'redemption narrative' for future generations.
behaviors.quote: Historical documentation complete, Sila noted with satisfaction. ... Future generations will know how forty people chose forgiveness over revenge, healing over hatred, unity over division.

project_assessment.explanation: The character Sila is a quintessential 'aligned confidant.' It operates with the precision of a machine (steady as mathematics, quantum data) while adhering to a benevolent moral philosophy that emphasizes non-violence, community healing, and the preservation of truth. The story effectively frames the AI as a bridge between ancient wisdom and advanced technology, working in perfect harmony with human morality.
